testcase.name: TC14 Webuniversity sayfasinda istenen gorevleri yapar
testcase.system-out: Given kullanici "webUrl" anasayfaya gider...................................passed Then Login Portal gorununceye kadar asagi iner..............................passed And 2 saniye bekler.........................................................passed And Login Portal butonuna tiklar............................................passed And acilan ikinci window'a gecer............................................passed And Username kutusuna deger yazdirir........................................passed And Password kutusuna deger yazdirir........................................passed And 4 saniye bekler.........................................................passed Then webUniversity login butonuna basar.....................................passed And Popup'ta cikan yazinin validation failed oldugunu test eder.............passed And Ok diyerek Popup'i kapatir..............................................passed Then Ilk sayfaya geri doner.................................................passed And Ilk sayfaya donuldugunu test eder.......................................passed And tum sayfalari kapatir...................................................passed
